title: Russ Feingold: The movement to “completely change the Constitution”
description: Chuck is joined by Russ Feingold, former Democratic senator from Wisconsin and co-author of a new book, “The Constitution in Jeopardy: An unprecedented effort to rewrite our fundamental law and what we can do about it.”
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
